channel.title: BlockChain Network on Project Dovetail™ - Docs and Tutorials
channel.description: Recent content in BlockChain Network on Project Dovetail™ - Docs and Tutorials

item.description: Test IOU Smart Contract in R3 Cora Network We will use Corda Demo Bench, install it if you don’t have it installed already. 1. Start up Corda Demo Bench First add all jars from corda directory Start up 3 nodes: Notary, charlie, alice, and bob Make sure they are all running befor contine. Follow the video for step by step instructions. 2. Issue an IOU At charlie terminal, issue an IOU

Test IOU chaincode in Hyperledger Fabric Network We need four docker images in order for “dev mode” to run against the supplied docker compose script. If you installed the fabric-samples repo clone and followed the instructions to download-platform-specific-binaries, then you should have the necessary Docker images installed locally. 1. open a terminal, and execute following command to start up the network docker-compose -f docker-compose-simple.yaml up open a terminal window, run docker ps, make sure container cli, chaincode, peer, orderer and couchdb are running
